item.title: What Is Wrong with my Yell Command?
item.dc:creator: @Miix_Tom Miix Tom
item.description:
@Miix_Tom wrote:

else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { if (playerRights == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Moderator] " +playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5); } else if (playerRights == 2) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Admin] " +playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5); } else if (playerRights == 3) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Owner] " +playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5); } else if (playerRights <= 0) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5); } } }

As th Topic… Whats Wrong?

when i type ::yell nothing happens…
